normalized: i was dreaming.
it was an old dream.
it was of the time when i had been a soldier of the neo-terras.
i was headed for earth while brainwashing and remodelling the two elite female soldiers, the pride of the new-solars, rieri bishop and naomi evans.
very special training had been bestowed onto my victims by remodelling their brain using a combination of nano-machines and a drug.
however, they had been completely oblivious of that development.

in addition to that, using the forbidden science of body remodelling, an abnormal pleasure constitution had been constructed for my victims, which was enough to instantly drive an average woman to insanity.
the basis of their brainwashing had been 『comfort missions』.
『while a female officer is travelling in a battleship, she must sexually service the male crew.
『in order to relieve their stress in outer space, and enable them to accomplish their tasks smoothly.
『satisfying the desires of men using your own bodies is the noble mission of a female officer.
we had planted such fake memories in both of them, by means of brain remodelling.
they became the target of our abuse while trying to fulfil their obligations of performing their roles as ideal female officers, despite the fact that they hated me intensely.
they used each and every part of their voluptuous womanly bodies to service me sexually, from their pussies, their anal-rectums, their boobs, all the way to their mouths,
the occupants of the ship had gathered with their only desire being to rape both of them.
they had both been relentlessly fucked by their dicks, one after another, until they became unable to even stand properly and their legs gave out.
they were photographed displaying their uncouth figures, as they proudly gulped down semen from mugs, and willingly gave defecation-shows in public.
by repeated brainwashing and remodelling, their original chaste personalities were eroded away.
ultimately, their personalities were completely rewritten and my puppets had been born.
it was inevitable.
rieri and naomi had tried to resist it.
during the final stage when their brainwashing was to be sealed, they had tried to defy me with their bodies, which had reached the stage of being driven to orgasm even by the mere act of walking.
later, my battleship was captured by the new-solars fleet, and i was sent to titan with my men and we were detained.
however, that had been in accordance to my plans as well.
i had transferred both of them to their brainwashed state by using a switch which i had setup beforehand, and they ended up rescuing me after having captured me themselves.
i escaped to the titan space-station, with both of them acting as my guides and with their help, i arrived on mars.
mars had been beautiful once, before beatrice kushan let its terra-forming run rampant.

name: naomi
normalized: …miss rieri.

normalized: what is the matter, naomi?

what do you think?

can there be a more important mission than protecting our master?

name: naomi
normalized: that… i understand that.

normalized: in that case, why are you making such a face?
it is quite unlike you.

normalized: miss rieri, i am feeling very uneasy.
it seems to me like i have forgotten something very important…

normalized: get a grip.
you will become ineligible as our master’s pig-slut, if you continue to act like this.

normalized: pig-slut… t-that’s right… we must do this… right…?

name: bohgan
normalized: (this is problematic…)
the brainwashing process conducted on rieri and naomi hadn’t been perfect.
right now, they were in my puppet state.
however, keeping them switched into their brainwashed state for too long ran the risk of them reverting back to their original personalities.
rieri was still thoroughly brainwashed, however,
naomi was beginning to question the things that she had been ordered to do.
it was a sign that her brainwashed personality was gradually reverting back to her original one.

name: bohgan
normalized: (any more of this, and it might get too dangerous to bring naomi along…)
however, i couldn’t leave her as she was.
it was problematic that naomi had expressed an interest in bailing out on her mission, which was a clear indication of her returning back to consciousness.

normalized: naomi.

rieri, be a good girl and stay here.

nevertheless, she tagged along with me.
i left the space-station with naomi in tow, and brought her with me to a deserted back-alley.

place your hands against that wall and push your ass out towards me.
